title: Himi 535
lyrics:
10.10.10.10.4.
1.
Ko e ‘ofa hulu si’o ‘ofa ē,
Mama’o ‘i he ‘atamai kotoa;
Kae feinga hoku loto ke tatae
Laulahi, mā’olunga, mo e loloa
He ‘ofa na.
2.
Ko e ‘ofa hulu si’o ‘ofa, ‘Eiki;
Ko hai ha taha te ne fa’a a’au?
Kau fie tala hano konga si’i
‘Ofa ne kumi ki he hia ko au,
‘O fakaofi.
3.
Ko e ‘ofa hulu si’o ‘ofa na;
Kohai ‘e lava hono fakamālō?
Kau fie viki ki he angahala,
‘Ofa tu’unga’a, afeitaulalo,
Laku noa.
4.
Neongo ‘eku vale hono lau
He ‘ofa ko ē, hono ki’i liliu?
Kae kei fekau pē ke te ‘alu atu,
‘O fakafonu ‘eku ngeʻesi ipu
He Matavai.
5.
Ko e ngeʻesi ipu au - he hono ai
Ha me’a ‘aonga kuo u feia atu?
‘Ete lelei kotoa pē ko e foaki,
‘O tala ai pē ke te ha’u mo haʻu,
‘O ‘utu ange.
6.
‘E Sīsū, fakafonu ‘ofa au,
‘O taki ki he matavai mo’ui;
Ke u toutou ‘utu ai, ‘o nofo maʻu,
Pea u māta’i ai pe ‘i he tui
‘A e ‘Afiona.
7.
Pea ka ‘iloange te u sioa
‘A Sīsū tonu, ‘o femātaaki;
Te u toki ‘ilo kano ‘a e lōloa,
Loloto, maaukupu, ivi lahi
He ‘ofa hulu. *
